thread.title: Danyiele

author: Danyiele
title: Danyiele
text: Jon was amazing with my vacation reservations. I even came back a day later and did an upgrade and it was pretty easy to do. Jon's personality over the phone was appealing and pleasant and this is the only time I have had as much fun spending $1700.00 at any given time. I would recommend Jon to a friend and I have already asked Jon about a possible future vactation.
